feed.title: South Bruce Peninsula - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , South Bruce Peninsula
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:34 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -6.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 01:30 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -6.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: WSW 46 km/h gust 70 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Blizzard. Local snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
